definition: powder/cosmetic face powder/food prepared from starch/noodles or pasta made from any kind of flour/whitewash/white/pink
to throw oneself at/to pounce on/to devote one's energies/to flap/to flutter/to dab/to pat/to bend over

sentences.english: Use the puff applicator for medium-to-full coverage.
sentences.chinese: 使用粉扑即可全面覆盖。

sentences.english: Louise dabbed at her face with a powder puff.
An ultra-soft flocked puff for application of Select Sheer.
sentences.chinese: 超软热卖的必定粉扑的选择。

sentences.english: It's better to choose powder snap and big brush when dressing, this can apply cosmetics rapidly.
sentences.chinese: 化妆时最好选用粉扑及大刷子，才能快速利落地上妆。

sentences.english: She was dabbing her cheeks with a powder-puff.
She used a powder puff to color her friend's face white.
sentences.chinese: 她用粉扑儿给朋友扑了一个大白脸。

sentences.english: The Powderpuff variety is completely covered with a double soft and silky coat.
sentences.chinese: 粉扑型覆盖着双层柔软的丝质被毛。

sentences.english: It's the puff you use to power your face.
sentences.chinese: 这是粉扑，是在脸上扑粉的工具。

sentences.english: You love blow and I, I love puff .
sentences.chinese: 你爱打击我，和我爱粉扑。

definition: to remove makeup/(old) to take off formal dress and ornaments
